name: Rigororus Social Share
author: Rigorous Theme

sections.description:
Rigorous Social Share

Rigorous Social Share is a free wordpress plugin that helps you to add different major social iocn like facebook, twitter, pinterest, google plus and linkedin in your post and page.

Features include

  • Add Twitter share button to your website
  • Add Facebook share button to your website
  • Add Google+ share button to your website
  • Add Pinterest share button to your website
  • Add Linkedin share button to your website
  • Add share count to your website
  • Option to show social icon before or after the post/page.
  • Option to choose different theme
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for rigorous-social-share
  3. Click Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download Rigorous Social Share from WordPress.
  2. Unzip rigorous-social-share.zip
  3. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/rigorous-social-share
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  5. For customizing the plugin’s settings, click on Rigorous Social Share menu in WordPress left admin menu.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin provides the ability to allow anyone easily share website content (page, posts) on major social media (Facebook, Twitter, googleplus, LinkedIn, Pinterest) by the use of the latest APIs on your website!

1.0.0

  • Plugin submitted to http://wordpress.org for review and approval
